about_association_desc: A tourist cooperative that obtained its license from the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Development (License No. 10139) and its technical supervision is the Ministry of Tourism, with the support of consultations by the entity/Council of Cooperative Societies. The main headquarters is Al-Ahsa Governorate, and its geographical scope is Al-Ahsa Governorate, where services will be provided.
our_vision_desc: Preserving the Kingdom’s historical, archaeological, cultural, natural and rural heritage, enriching the human resources that characterize Al-Ahsa Governorate, and employing them in a sustainable manner in developing tourism in its various forms. The association pledges to adhere to a set of values ​​that it considers as reference points in performing its mission, carrying out its responsibilities, and in its dealings.

values_list.shared_profitability: Shared Profitability for Members and Local Community

our_goals_desc: The association aims to improve the economic and social situation of its members and the people of its service area and seeks through its activities to achieve the goals of the Kingdom’s Vision 2030. The association is interested in training and qualifying young cadres working in the tourism sector, marketing their products, empowering them and highlighting them in order to provide distinguished services that enhance the returns of these services to benefit the association’s shareholders and beneficiaries. It stimulates the implementation of purposeful programs and events with financial returns and markets services and their providers.
insights_desc: Preserving the Kingdom’s historical, archaeological, cultural, natural and rural heritage, enriching the human resources that characterize Al-Ahsa Governorate, and employing them in a sustainable manner in developing tourism in its various forms. The association pledges to adhere to a set of values ​​that it considers as reference points in performing its mission, carrying out its responsibilities, and in its dealings.
all_rights_reserved: All rights reserved to the Tourism Cooperative Society in Ahsa
